original_text: Then Miriam, Aaron's sister, who was a prophet, took a tambourine in her hand. All the other women followed her, with tambourines in their hands. They danced while Miriam sang to them. 15: A tambourine is a thing to make music. It is like a small drum that you hold in your hand. Then Miriam, Aaron's sister, who was a prophet, took a tambourine in her hand. All the other women followed her, with tambourines in their hands. They danced while Miriam sang to them. 15: A tambourine is a thing to make music. It is like a small drum that you hold in your hand. Then Miriam, Aaron's sister, who was a prophet, took a tambourine in her hand. All the other women followed her, with tambourines in their hands. They danced while Miriam sang to them.
korean_text: 아론의 누이 선지자 미리암이 손에 소고를 잡으매 모든 여인도 그를 따라 나오며 소고를 잡고 춤추니

sentences.original_text: Then Miriam, Aaron's sister, who was a prophet
took a tambourine in her hand
All the other women followed her
They danced while Miriam sang to them
sentences.korean_translation: 미리암이 노래하는 동안 그들은 춤을 췄습니다

sentences.original_text: A tambourine is a thing to make music
It is like a small drum
that you hold in your hand
